title: Hideous Typeface I Need to match
content:
I would be massively grateful if somebody could help identify this font :)  
cheers,  
Debs

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [dolbadarn.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211024356/http:/typophile.com/files/dolbadarn.JPG) | 13.29 KB |
author: petitchien

comments.content:
[Rieven Uncial](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211024356/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/delve/rieven-uncial/regular/) is close but does not have the lc e as shown on your sample. [American Uncial](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211024356/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/american-uncial/) has the right shape but seems a bit fat, and less the serifs on your sample.

as this is embroidered, you might have luck looking on sites specific to fonts used with those machines.

oh and here's a better sample

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211024356im_/http:/typophile.com/files/YDOLBADa_3825.jpg)
